main event: A civilian observed a brilliant light moving rapidly in the northern sky while stargazing.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about a minute before the object disappeared without a trace., The witness saw the object while looking at the constellations with a friend., Another witness, 'Paul', also saw two cylindrical white objects flying at a high speed., The objects were noted to have a bounding motion, like skipping stones on water., There was absolutely no sound associated with the sighting.
sighted object: a brilliant light and two cylindrical white objects
witness description: two civilians with knowledge of astronomy
